EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow]]> Learn how to be cloud-native with experts from Pivotal.
Casey West Principal Technologist
Kenny Bastani Spring Developer Advocate
See firsthand how to boost developers' productivity so they can focus their time executing better and faster. Over the course of the day, you will learn how to be cloud-native using the Pivotal Cloud Foundry platform, build microservices with Spring, architect for resilience with Spring Cloud, and integrate analytics with Spring Cloud Data Flow.
St. Louis Monday, November 14th
Register <[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/stlouis]]>
This full-day event is meant to outline the capabilities and outcomes of a cloud-native software organization—building up from infrastructure automation and container orchestration to lifecycle management and application frameworks. See how Pivotal Cloud Foundry and Spring Boot can be brought together to create a continuous delivery pipeline and learn about the power of Spring Cloud to build microservice architectures and data analytics.
Agenda 8:30 AM—9:30 AM Registration & Breakfast
9:30 AM—10:15 AM The Cloud-Native Advantage Overview of the what, why, and how of a cloud-native organization with a focus on principles and capabilities including people, process, and tools.
10:30 AM—12:00 PM The Promises of a Cloud-Native Platform Walk through the workflows to build a pipeline to deliver microservices with Pivotal Cloud Foundry and Spring Boot.
12:00 PM—1:00 PM Lunch
1:00 PM—1:30 PM The Value Moves Up the Stack With the capabilities of a cloud-native organization in mind, outline the value map of ownership and cost with regards to differentiated value and commodification.
1:30 PM—3:15 PM Architecting the Cloud-Native Application Building up from simply deploying microservices to leverage cloud-native architectures with Spring Cloud to create resilience and Spring Cloud Data Flow to integrate with a variety of data services.
3:15 PM—3:30 PM Wrap Up
Register now <[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/stlouis]]> for this exclusive event. The event is FREE; space is limited.
Questions? Please contact us via email <[[mailto:cloudnativeroadshow@pivotal.io]]> or visit our website <[[http://pivotal.io/events]]>.
